segments.speaker: Jamie
segments.text: So how's it going with that person you were dating? You two seemed really happy last time I saw you.

segments.speaker: Sam
segments.text: Oh... yeah. Um, that didn't really work out actually.

segments.speaker: Jamie
segments.text: Oh no, what happened? You guys seemed so good together!

segments.speaker: Sam
segments.text: It's... complicated. I don't really want to get into it, you know?

segments.speaker: Jamie
segments.text: Oh, totally. I get it. Hey, let's talk about something else - did you end up going to that concert last weekend?

segments.speaker: Sam
segments.text: Yes! Oh my god, it was amazing. The opener was actually better than I expected...
